alert.message: mantis-kevm: The average cluster block rate per minute is under 1 for a 10 minute period
alert.name: [Mantis] Cluster Block Alert

alert.message:
Miner node is diverging from maximum block height.

General solution is to restart the allocation and have it re-sync.
alert.name: Block Divergence / Time alert

targets.expr: abs(max(app_sync_block_number_gauge_gauge{namespace="$namespace"}) - ignoring(host, db, url, client_id, namespace) group_right() app_sync_block_number_gauge_gauge{namespace="$namespace"})
abs(max(app_sync_block_number_gauge_gauge{namespace=~"mantis-.*"}) - ignoring(host, db, url, client_id, namespace) group_right(client_id) app_sync_block_number_gauge_gauge{namespace=~"mantis-.*"})

alert.message: mantis-kevm: The average block time between blocks for a node in the cluster is above 100 seconds for a 5 minute period
alert.name: [Mantis] Block Alert

panels.description: The time between mined blocks in seconds
panels.title: Time between blocks

alert.message: mantis-kevm: Mantis testnet cluster has failed to complete an hourly backup.
alert.name: [Mantis] Completed Backup Jobs alert

panels.description: Mantis completed backups in a 1 hr period
panels.title: Mantis Completed Backup Jobs

alert.message: mantis-ops: There have been more than 5 single node or 10 cluster wide data absences in the past hour on mantis-kevm.
alert.name: [Mantis] Data Gaps in 1 hr alert

panels.description: Shows the number of absences in the block number metric that occur over a 1 hour period
panels.title: Data Absences in 1 hr

alert.message: mantis-kevm: Mantis testnet cluster has failed an hourly backup job.
alert.name: [Mantis] Failed Backup Jobs alert

panels.description: Mantis failed backups in a 1 hr period
panels.title: Mantis Failed Backup Jobs
Number of Votes for Latest Checkpoint
Latest Checkpoint Candidate fetched from Midnight
Mined blocks (not all mined blocks end up included in the chain)

panels.description: mined blocks / total blocks in the chain * 100
panels.title: Mined blocks rate ($node)

panels.description: The start time of the process from up to 7 days ago
panels.title: Start time

panels.description: Shows uptime as long as 7 days
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Time between latest imported block and its parent
panels.title: Latest block time

panels.description:
- Apdex RPC_responses = (SatisfiedCount + ToleratingCount / 2) / TotalSamples

SatisfiedCount = MethodsSuccessCounter
ToleratingCount = MethodsErrorCounter
TotalSamples = MethodsSuccessCounter + MethodsErrorCounter + MethodsExceptionCounter
panels.title: apdex_RPC responses
